channel.title: Markdown on Hugo Future Imperfect Slim
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on Hugo Future Imperfect Slim

item.title: Markdown and Shortcodes
item.description: Thanks! Special thanks to Markdown Cheatsheet. H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 Alt-H1 Alt-H2 # H1 ## H2 ### H3 #### H4 ##### H5 ###### H6 Alt-H1 ====== Alt-H2 ------ Emphasis, aka italics, with asterisks or underscores. Strong emphasis, aka bold, with asterisks or underscores. Combined emphasis with asterisks and underscores. Strikethrough uses two tildes. Scratch this. Emphasis, aka italics, with *asterisks* or _underscores_. Strong emphasis, aka bold, with **asterisks** or __underscores__.
